content: treble_crochet p treble_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch step 1 step 2 slip_stitch in the next st chain 4 treble_crochet picot stitch treble_crochet chain 4 slip_stitch steps 3-14 repeat row 2 in all the remaining sts fasten_off after the 14th petal picot weave in your ends and create another now you have a pair step 1 step 14 step 6 14 all in one st assembly attach earring hooks to any one of the picot stitch on each sunflower your earring is ready © elemental knots - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you can sell the finished products with your own photos but if you do so please give pattern credit to elemental knots thank you and enjoy © elemental knots - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you can sell the finished products with your own photos but if you do so please give pattern credit to elemental knots thank you and enjoy
